channel.title: 📰 United Republic of Sapicic — June Bulletin
channel.description: Sapicic Daily Bulletin — Broadcast from Sky Dome Studios, Central Heights

item.title: 🏦 Sapicic International Bank Enters Public Beta
item.description:
June 8 marks the public beta launch of Sapicic International Bank (SIB)!
Fully digital, fully extra — with biometric vibe scans and budgeting alerts.
“Physical banks are so last season,” says the SIB CEO.

item.title: 🚇 Central Heights Metro Expands with New Lines
item.description:
Phase 2 of the Central Heights City Metro (CHCM) is live! 🚆✨
Brand new lines have opened, connecting many areas.
“Maglev trains and immersive light art — your commute is now a gallery.”

item.title: 🧪 Creative & Q.L.E.D. Zones Coming to Riversong
item.description:
Q.L.E.D. Zones (Questionably Labeled Experimental Districts), and Creative Zones are coming!
Designed for creators, innovators, and mildly confused intellectuals.
🏙️ Expect: Glowing roads, semi-sentient lampposts, cafés that accept poetry as payment.

item.title: 📈 Stock Market Going Live This Month
item.description:
Sapicic’s stock exchange is launching!
Invest in vibes, not just profit. Notable listings include:
• TSPPL – Tranquillità Sound Proofing Private Limited
• IRND – Innovate RND Private Limited
• ZSI – Zuihei Shipment Inc
“Here, vibes outperform profit margins.” – Minister of Treasury

item.title: 📐 Aesthetic Compliance Code Rolls Out
item.description:
Starting June 7, every city must follow the new Aesthetic Compliance Code,
ensuring street design unity and minimum ✨chaos per block✨.

item.title: 🎓 Students Demand Curriculum Overhaul
item.description:
Avaneesh University students are protesting for standardized creative education.
🗣️ “More drawing classes, fewer disconnected metaphors,” says one frustrated student.

item.title: 🌿 Purple Line Delayed by Rogue Plant
item.description:
Botanic Center Station shutdown due to an aggressively overgrown plant!
🌱 It now stars in an art piece titled “Flora vs. Infrastructure.”

item.title: 🏠 Leaked Housing Code Sparks Debate
item.description:
Leaked Artistic Compliance Code may ban rentals, requiring home ownership.
Critics: “Unhinged utopia.”
Supporters: “Down with shipping container minimalism.”
